Package com.meta64.mobile.lucene

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileIndexer
    Recursively scans all files in a folder (and subfolders) and indexes them into Lucene
    FileSearcher
    Searches files indexed by Lucene (i.e.
    Indexer
    Launches the FileInexer to index into Lucene, as a Java-main entry point
    Searcher
    Performs a test search (Java-main entry point) to perform a test search of files indexed by lucene)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileProperties
    File-related constants
